## Bcp47.LanguageTag.createFromSubtags() method

Creates a new [language tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md) from a supplied [subtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.subtags.md) using optional configuration, if supplied.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static createFromSubtags(subtags: Subtags, options?: LanguageTagInitOptions): Result<LanguageTag>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  subtags | [Subtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.subtags.md) |  |
|  options | [LanguageTagInitOptions](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetaginitoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ (optional) set of [init options](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetaginitoptions.md) to guide the validation and normalization of this tag. |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[LanguageTag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the new [language tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md) or `Failure` with details if an error occurs.
